title: A Debt of Blood
goal: Lyra's personal vendetta against the Corruption is revealed, and she joins the party.

beats.summary: Kaelen senses Lyra's deep personal connection to the Blight and presses her, revealing that her family or home was lost to it.
The group helps Lyra resolve a local crisis caused by the Blight, proving their commitment and skill.
Driven by a desire for vengeance and seeing hope in Kaelen's power, Lyra agrees to join, offering her invaluable knowledge of the corrupted lands.
